item.title: 20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day
item.description:
20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day

There will be plenty of love in the Wine Country air this Valentine's Day as couples celebrate not just the most romantic day of the year but a three-day weekend thanks to President's Day. We've rounded up 20 romantic things to do in Wine Country-10 in the Napa Valley and 10 in Sonoma County-so you can get started on your Feb.

item.title: Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines
item.description:
Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines

Auberge du Soleil is offering a five-course meal and special wine pairings in honor of the historic occasion...

item.title: Ask a Somm: How Can I Drink Wine With Girl Scout Cookies?
item.description:
Ask a Somm: How Can I Drink Wine With Girl Scout Cookies?

Many people think chocolate and red wine go together. I whole-heartedly disagree Cincinnati, Ohio-based wine pro Kevin Hart pairs Brunello at Sotto and Jura at Boca, two of the city's top eateries. But he's also behind consulting service Hart & Cru, which likewise operates as an online wine shop dedicated to small production American and European bottles.

item.title: Inaugural California Wine Symposium in Havana Cuba Taking Shape
item.description:
Inaugural California Wine Symposium in Havana Cuba Taking Shape

Wine Business Blog

item.title: The 40th Anniversary of the Paris Tasting
item.description:
The 40th Anniversary of the Paris Tasting

This year marks four decades since the infamous Paris Tasting of 1976, the one in which French judges were mortified when they picked California wines as victors in blind tastings. The "Judgment of Paris," as the tasting came to be known, put California winemaking on the map, inspiring people all over the globe to take its craft seriously.

item.title: County wrestles with Caymus Vineyards issues
item.description:
County wrestles with Caymus Vineyards issues

Long-running efforts by Napa County and Caymus Vineyards to make certain the Rutherford winery is following county rules are entering what could be the home stretch. The Napa County Board of Supervisors on Tuesday discussed the outlines of a proposed development agreement between the two parties.

item.title: Sonoma estate with vineyard and lavish grounds
item.description:
Sonoma estate with vineyard and lavish grounds

Twice a week, The Chronicle features a home on the market that caught our eye for its architecture, history or character. Built in the early 1990s and expanded by more than 2,000 square feet in 2013, this four-bedroom contemporary Mediterranean home has a welcoming floor plan accented by picture and clerestory windows.

item.title: Two Birds One Stone: Douglas Keane and Sang Yoon to open Napa Valley yakitori restaurant
item.description:
Two Birds One Stone: Douglas Keane and Sang Yoon to open Napa Valley yakitori restaurant

Big news from Wine Country: Douglas Keane and Sang Yoon are opening a new restaurant in St. Helena's Freemark Abbey. Set to open in June, it will be a yakitori-centric restaurant, with a focus largely on poultry and vegetables. As a top-flight restaurant, it will appropriately be named Two Birds One Stone.

item.title: BottleRock Napa Valley Daily Lineup Revealed | Billboard
item.description:
BottleRock Napa Valley Daily Lineup Revealed | Billboard

The daily lineup for the 2016 BottleRock Napa Valley fest has been published. Stevie Wonder will close out the opening day of the festival (May 27), while British indie rock stars Florence + The Machine will wrap up proceedings on day two (May 28) and Red Hot Chili Peppers will draw curtains on the three-day event on May 29.
